digitalResolution.description: number of bits of resolution in the digital output

conversionTime.description: time required to convert from an analog signal to digital output

sampleRate.description: maximum rate at which the ADC can convert samples

offsetError.description: difference (in LSB) of the output at the zero point between an actual and ideal ADC

gainError.description: difference (in LSB) of how the actual transfer function matches the ideal transfer function, also called full scale error

integralNonlinearity.description: deviation (in LSB) of an actual transfer function from an ideal transfer function

differentialNonlinearity.description: difference (in LSB) in step width between the actual and ideal transfer functions

rmsNoise.description: root mean square (RMS) noise of ADC

SNR.description: signal to noise (SNR) ratio of the converter

inputType.description: whether the ADC has a single ended or differential input

currentConsumption.description: current used by device in various power modes
